sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1711
sect2.para:

Requirement is not verified The DWA shall only transmit the Mastercode within the long schedule table for arming and disarming the siren.
Note: Two scheduletables are used for the lin communication between ICAS1 and Sirene: The long scheduletable (main) and the short (sharp/armed) scheduletable.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1711 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1532
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 1622 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 1714
Requirement is not verified IF ( RTE_E_OK == retValbStrgSNDSchaerfenLibRequest AND (status of storing Master code generation exceeds maximum number of retries OR Master code was generated properly )) then < bStrgSNDSchaerfenLIN := bStrgSNDSchaerfenLibRequest >
Note: The DWA shall delay transmission of the arming request to the sounder only until the safety code has been successfully stored. The DWA shall make sure that in case of a disarming request of the SW-component DWA, this request is transmitted with the same safety code as the one used for arming.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1532 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

If the software component receives an arming request and the mastercode can not be loaded from the NVM, Master Code generation shall be initiated.
Note: The signal for arming request is bStrgSNDSchaerfenLibRequest . ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1712 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1543
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 684 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 744 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 1162 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 2021 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 2479
Requirement is not verified IF ((Master code == 0x00 OR Master code == 0xFF) AND counter of attempts <= 2) then <Generate master="" code>="">
ELSE IF ((Master code == 0x00 OR Master code == 0xFF) AND counter of attempts > 2) then < The DTC 0x040611 set to NOT_OK > < Master code := 0x00 > ELSE <The DTC 0x040611 set to OK>
Note: bStSounderSafeLedDTCAktiv is activated or deactivated based on DTC status. Detailed behavior is defined in SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1499.
Note: In case of unsuccessful master code generation up to two more attempts shall be performed. If all three attempts will be unsuccessful the DTC 0x040611 should be set N_OK otherwise in case of successful master code generation DTC 0x040611 should be set OK. ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1543 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1541
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 684 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 744 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 1202 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 2022 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 2531
Requirement is not verified IF ( status of storing Master code in the EEPROM == NOT_OK AND counter of attempts <= 2) then <Storage master="" code="" in="" the="" eeprom>="">
ELSE IF ( status of storing Master code in the EEPROM == NOT_OK AND counter of attempts > 2) then <The DTC 0x040711 set to NOT_OK> < Master code := 0x00 > ELSE <The DTC 0x040711 set to OK>
Note: Immediately after Master code generation it shall be stored in NVMRam. It shall be verified that storage in NVRam is successful. In case of unsuccessful storage up to two more attempts shall be performed. If all three attempts will be unsuccessful the DTC 0x040711 should be set N_OK otherwise in case of successful storage DTC 0x040711 should be set OK.
Note: bStSounderSafeLedDTCAktiv is activated or deactivated based on DTC status. Detailed behavior is defined in SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1499. ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1541 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

Requirement is not verified IF ( (s_KL_15 == off OR s_KL_15 == on) AND cp_DWA_verbaut==1 AND (pc_DWA_mit_IRUe==1 OR pc_DWA_mit_NGS==1) ) then ( IF( electric error in the corresponding LIN_Sensor == "active" (DTC 0x04090E) OR Sensor-ATWS -> no signal/communication == "active" (DTC 0x040904) OR LIN 4 - electric error == "active" (0x100154) OR LIN 4 - no communication == "active" (0x100254) ) then enStDWASensorKommErrSt := 1; else enStDWASensorKommErrSt := 0; ) Note: LIN errors are described in GW_Ereignisspeicher: GW_Dia_Err_296 and GW_Dia_Err_304

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1709
sect2.para:

Requirement is not verified IF CAN_Message_Status(Anhaenger_01) is equal to NoError then enAnhaengerErrSt := 0x00; ELSE IF TimeoutDelayElapsed is elapsed and CAN Bus is active then enAnhaengerErrSt := 0x01; ELSE enAnhaengerErrSt := 0x02;
Robustness measure : A delay of 50ms should be applied for enAnhaengerErrSt signal in case of NoError transmission (because of the communication between AAG ecu and ICAS1 ecu)
Note: TimeoutDelayElapsed is described in SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1694. ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1709 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
